General.Name: Song Shang Electronics Co Ltd
General.Description: Song Shang Electronics Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells magnetic components, printed circuit boards, and wire products. It offers magnetic components include coils, line filters, power chokes, transformers, and inductors primarily used in the adapter, LED TV, LCD TV, charger, game console, desktop, monitor, printer, lighting, and communication applications. The company also provides printed circuit boards for use in consumable electronic products, power supplies, machinery, instruments, and automotive, as well as other industries. In addition, it offers wire products for LED TV and display, car audio, battery, power supply equipment, and home appliances. The company was formerly known as K-Bridge Electronics Co. Ltd. and changed its name to Song Shang Electronics Co., Ltd. in March 2011. Song Shang Electronics Co., Ltd. was founded in 1988 and is based in New Taipei City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 117, Zhongcheng Road, New Taipei City, Taiwan, 236
